title: BenchmarkQED: Automated benchmarking of RAG systems
content:
BenchmarkQED is an open-source toolkit for benchmarking RAG systems using automated query generation, evaluation, and dataset prep. It shows that LazyGraphRAG outperforms standard methods, especially on complex, global queries.
The post BenchmarkQED: Automated benchmarking of RAG systems appeared first on Microsoft Research.
author: Darren Edge, Ha Trinh, Andres Morales Esquivel, Jonathan Larson
